description:
Have you ever had an idea for a kid's game, but didn't know how to get started making it? Would you like to make web and mobile games, but don't want to learn a programming language? Well, you've come to the right place!

In this video course you'll learn how to:

  • Create 3 games for kids without writing code
  • Use Construct 2 software (FREE!)
  • Publish your game to be played on computers and mobile devices
  • Go from complete beginner to game developer

Here's what you'll get:

  • Over 2 hours of video tutorials
  • All source files of the games
  • Artwork, sound effects and music needed to create 3 games
title: Creating Kid's Games with Construct 2
